commands.name: !therun
responses: Interested in seeing extra details and statistics about my splits as I speedrun? Check my profile on TheRun.gg, and click the live button to see realtime updates on my current run! https://therun.gg/live/Elite_Spud

commands.name: !blind_recurring
responses: This is a blind playthrough, which means that I know nothing about this game want to keep it that way. Do not tell me how to play the game. Do not spoil. Do not fake spoil. Do not hint, backseat, advise, guide, remind, or warn me in any way, please. Consider all questions to be rhetorical. Revel in my ignorance, and enjoy my suffering. https://gist.github.com/elite-spud/cd03e5250cae33d2cd808acb6cb63327

commands.name: !spoilerdiscord_recurring
responses: Wanna talk spoilers without posting directly in twitch chat? I've got a dedicated channel for spoiler-y discussion in the Discord server! Consider telling the folks in here that you'll be talking there so that others can join in on the conversation! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8

commands.name: !crowdcontrol
responses: Crowd Control provides a way for viewers to interact with the game I'm playing on stream! Whether you choose to help, hinder, or just make things look a bit silly while I play, the power is in *your* hands. Everyone gets 50 free coins that they can use to fuel these effects, but you can also exchange channel points (or money) to earn more! Visit https://interact.crowdcontrol.live/#/twitch/47243772 to spend coins, or try using the integrated twitch extension (it even works on mobile)!

commands.name: !crowdcontrolchallenge
responses: Welcome to the 3nd annual Luigi's Mansion Crowd Control Max% playthrough! If you're unfamiliar with what the heck is going on here, you can type !cc and !max% to learn more, but in a nutshell, I'm trying to collect as much in-game money as possible while chat tries to stop me with the power of real-world money. For every 500,000G that I'm missing at the end of my playthrough, I'll donate an additional $5 to The Trevor Project

commands.name: !incentive
responses: $290 = Put on fox ears â€¢ $315 = Part my hair the wrong way â€¢ $350 = F-Zero GX Music Tier List â€¢ $400 = Cursed racing wheel controls stream (future)

commands.name: !attractmode
responses: I'll be participating in the Lady Arcaders' Attract Mode once again on May 5th at 1:00 CST, by playing some F-Zero GX. The plan is to speedrun through the story mode on Very Hard difficulty, but if I finish that quickly, then I might have time for some other stuff!

commands.name: !laraidtrain
responses: The Lady Arcaders are celebrating their 3 year anniversary this year, so the collective has organized a massive raid train event to mark the occasion! https://ladyarcaders.com/raid-train/2025/ For 3 days, dozens of streamers will take their viewers on a scenic tour through the LA community as we raise money for future events. If you're interested in donating to support our organization, click here: https://ko-fi.com/ladyarcaders

commands.name: !gdqhotfix
responses: On Saturday, July 19 at 2:09 PM ET, I'll be appearing on GDQ Hotfix running the F-Zero GX Story Mode WITH A RACING WHEEL as part of the Non-Binary People's Day celebration! @AKC_12 will be joining me on comms! Full schedule here: https://bsky.app/profile/gamesdonequick.com/post/3ltx47prdfs2e

commands.name: !gdq
responses: I'm attending AGDQ 2026 as an onsite runner for Luigi's Mansion! Depending on the result of a a category upgrade incentive, I'll either be running Any% (No OoB) [PAL] or 100% [PAL] on Sunday, January 4th at ~9:30 PM ET. See y'all in Pittsburgh! https://gamesdonequick.com/schedule/62

commands.name: !bbbbq
responses: I'll be participating in the Binary Breakers' Summer BBQ on Saturday! @enbyzee will be joining me on comms while I play through Luigi's Mansion Any% (No OoB) [PAL] https://horaro.org/bbsbbq/2024?key=BYOBBQ

commands.name: !completithon
responses: I'll be running Luigi's Mansion Max% as part of Completithon 2024 on Sunday, August 18th at 8:30 PM EDT! https://horaro.org/completithon2024/schedule As far as I know, this is the first Max% showcase in several years, so it's certain to be a special run!

commands.name: !charity
responses: We're fundraising in support of The Trevor Project, a nonprofit organization focused on suicide prevention for LGBTQIA+ youth. If you'd like to donate, there are two ways to do so! Donating through Crowd Control gives you access to extra coins that can be used to fuel the chaos on-stream https://interact.crowdcontrol.live/#/twitch/47243772 but if you'd prefer to contribute without dealing with all of that, please follow this direct link to the fundraising campaign: https://tilt.fyi/4zHfmGHrPJ

commands.name: !bt1d
responses: Breakthrough T1D is the worldâ€™s largest nonprofit funder of type 1 diabetes (T1D) research. With your support, we hope to find cures for T1D and improve the lives of those affected by it: https://tiltify.com/@elite-spud/game-over-t1d-2024

commands.name: !chickennugget%
responses: This playthrough fulfills an incentive that was met by my community! I'll be playing through what is essentially Max%, only I'll be eating 1 chicken nugget after each Boo that I capture. Yes, Boolossus counts as 15 nuggets. I am aware that this is a bad idea, because I am the one who came up with it.

commands.name: !runningthroughwonderland
responses: On Saturday, October 19th at 8:00 PM EST, I'll be running Luigi's Mansion 100% as part of a charity marathon in support of AliceAtWonderlandGames! LuckyOwl360 will be joining me on comms, and we'll have a category upgrade incentive to potentially have me showcase PAL 100% for an even more exciting run! Check out the full schedule here: https://horaro.org/rtw/schedule

commands.name: !lickython
responses: On Sunday, October 27th I'll be running Luigi's Mansion AND F-Zero GX as part of the charity marathon, LickyThon! This is the 4th iteration of this marathon, and it'll be benefitting the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia. It's also an in-person event, so I'll be sitting on a couch with a bunch of other cool people while I run both games! Check out the schedule here: https://horaro.org/lickython4/schedule and tune into the stream over at https://www.twitch.tv/lickarcade

commands.name: !pacelta
responses: On Monday, November 4th, 7 Luigi's Mansion runners will participate in an in-person Live Time Attack competition at PACE's Fall 2024 event. I'll be assisting with comms for this event, which will last for 9 straight hours from 11 AM - 8PM Eastern time. Check out the full schedule to see the runners involved as well as other games being featured! https://horaro.org/pace24f/schedule

commands.name: !questforquet
responses: On Saturday, July 26th at 12:00 PM ET, I'll be running F-Zero GX - Story Mode (Very Hard) as part of a charity marathon in support of @TrainerAnade, who's in need of a new service dog ðŸ’œ. @debeaunairVT will be joining me on comms, and we'll have an incentive open ahead of the run to watch all the cutscenes, so if you'd like to donate, make sure to pop in early to fund that goal! Check out the full schedule here: https://horaro.org/qfq/schedule

commands.name: !hydrate
responses: Friendly reminder to take a sip of water, stretch your legs, take any meds or vitamins you need, and grab a snack if you're hungry.

commands.name: !youtube
responses: VODs get posted to Youtube (in higher quality than streams!): https://www.youtube.com/@elite_spud
Blind playthroughs and other interesting streams get uploaded to YouTube here: https://www.youtube.com/@elite_spud
Miss a playthrough you really wanted to catch? I archive my streams locally at 1440p and post them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/@elite_spud

commands.name: !discord
responses: We have a Discord server! Join in and be a part of the community offstream! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Want consistent notifications when the stream is live? Join the Discord server and request a role to always get pinged! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Enjoy using my sub emotes? You can link your Twitch account with Discord to get access to them on other servers if you're a subscriber. No Nitro required! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Like seeing Loki and the other kitties on stream? You can see more of them and other folks' animals in the community Discord! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Wanna talk about music you love or discovered recently? We've got a space for that! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Do you like to cook or consider yourself a food-lover? See what the community's been dining on recently in our Discord server: https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Interested in talking about all the intricacies that go into streaming? Hear what the fine folks here have to say in our dedicated Discord channels for stream/tech talk https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Sometimes I don't know what to play on stream, and I run a poll to find out what folks wanna see! Join the community Discord server to cast your vote! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8
Want to participate in the community celebration streams we organize every so often? Hop in the discord to join the games we play together! https://discord.gg/f4bhKYxPy8

commands.name: !music
responses: I collect music CDs and keep track of what I listen to as a hobby. You can judge my music taste here https://rateyourmusic.com/~elite_spud and here https://www.last.fm/user/elite_spud
I've been building up a small collection of music CDs for a few years. See what I've got and what I've been listening to https://rateyourmusic.com/~elite_spud & https://www.last.fm/user/elite_spud

In my spare time, I curate a small music CD collection, mostly focused around heavy, progressive, dark, and ambient genres. Check out what I have at https://rateyourmusic.com/~elite_spud + https://www.last.fm/user/elite_spud and feel free to shoot me a recommendation (any genre) if you've got one!

commands.name: !instagram
responses: I have an instagram where I post pictures of my cats and also cool places I travel https://www.instagram.com/elite.spud/
Hey, wanna see some cute cats? https://www.instagram.com/elite.spud/
I might not consider myself much of a photographer, but I do like to stop and take pictures of flowers and other beautiful things I see from day to day https://www.instagram.com/elite.spud/

commands.name: !av
responses: Wanna know how many wires are in my AV setup? Or what it takes to play GameBoy games on a PC monitor? Check out the diagram I made to keep up with it all, and don't be afraid to ask me questions about any specific components: https://gist.github.com/elite-spud/6f82f3da9d586df553757fa134278845

Wondering what kind of hardware I use to stream/play console games? Take a look at my layout diagram to see how everything hooks together: https://gist.github.com/elite-spud/6f82f3da9d586df553757fa134278845. Don't be afraid to ask questions about how everything works!

responses: You can find a list of all the parts in my PC / stream setup here: https://pcpartpicker.com/user/elite_spud/saved/VyqDzy

commands.name: !github
responses: I (Spud) wrote this chatbot myself because I'm a big nerd. If you fancy yourself a nerd too, you can peruse the source code on GitHub here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot
This chatbot is Â© Spud Inc., which maintains an open policy of showcasing the programming mistakes of the author for all to see here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot
I'm a software engineer by day, and this chatbot is actually one of my side-projects! If you want to see how it works, you can find all the source code here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot
I'm not a potato, I'm a bot! Get a peek at my source code here: https://github.com/elite-spud/spudbot

commands.name: !glitchwave
responses: I took the time to catalog and rate all the games I've played over the years. Take a peek at my favorites and not-so-favorites here: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/
Curious if I've played your favorite game before, and/or what my opinions about it are? Look no further: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/
Got a favorite game? Me too: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/
What's the worst game I've ever played? The answer may surprise you: https://glitchwave.com/user/elite_spud/

commands.name: !twitchnotifications
responses: Twitch notifications are sometimes inconsistent, but I try to include silly little messages in my going live pings for each stream, so turn 'em on if you wanna be implicated in my shenanigans! You can manage your notifications in detail here: https://www.twitch.tv/settings/notifications

commands.name: !streamteam
responses: I'm part of a stream team on Twitch! If you're looking for some amazing nonbinary streamers to follow, check out the Binary Breakers! https://www.twitch.tv/team/binarybreakers

commands.name: !gamesuggestions
responses: Channel points can be used to request games that you want me to play on stream! Submit your favorite title, challenge me with something super difficult, share the weirdest game you know of, or help fund someone else's suggestion! Almost anything is fair game so long as I have the means to play it! (e.g. no VR, foreign visual novels, etc.) Check out the spreadsheet to see everyone's requests! https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dNi-OkDok6SH8VrN1s23l-9BIuekwBgfdXsu-SqIIMY/edit?gid=384782784

commands.name: !bidwar
responses: Have you cheered bits on the channel before? You might have a balance in the bidwar bank! The current bidwar will be active until the end of 2024, so make sure to use your points to vote on your favorite option. Type '!bidwar contribute' to get started! https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1dNi-OkDok6SH8VrN1s23l-9BIuekwBgfdXsu-SqIIMY/edit?gid=877321766

commands.name: !response
responses: Ask a question but didn't get an answer? Feel free to ask again in a few minutes with an @ if I don't respond the first time!
I often get tunnel vision when playing video games on stream, so it's tough to keep up with chat sometimes. If your question isn't answered, please ask again after a little while!
Sorry if I miss any of your questions! I promise it's not intentional. Please @ me and ask again if I don't get around to your message the first time.

I'm easily distracted, and often go on tangents while in the middle of talking about things. If I get sidetracked while talking about something you found interesting, please feel free to bring it up again so I can finish sharing my thoughts!

I sometimes stream games which require a lot of focus to play, so it's not uncommon for me to miss important chat messages while I'm in the zone. If it seems like I missed your message, or didn't address anything to your satisfaction, please ask me to clarify or elaborate further and I'll be more than happy to oblige.

commands.name: !avquality
responses: Does the stream audio sound extra crunchy today? Video appear out of sync, jittery, or fuzzy? Let me know about any perceived technical problems so I can address them and provide everyone with the best quality stream that I can offer!

commands.name: !rules
responses: Chat Rules: â€¢ No bigotry, harassment, or intolerance allowed. Respect other folks or be banned â€¢ Don't spoil anything â€¢ Don't tell me how to play the game â€¢ Don't trauma dump. I want to cultivate a safe and positive space in my chat â€¢ Keep any political / religious discussions civil and infrequent â€¢ Stream is generally PG to PG-13. I prefer not to swear for my own reasons, but don't really care if you do (within reason) â€¢ No shortened hyperlinks â€¢ No self-promotion spam â€¢ Don't be a dingus

commands.name: !pronouns
responses: Spud's pronouns are They/She. See other chatters' pronouns and set your own here (if you'd like others to know them): https://pronouns.alejo.io/

commands.name: !trans
responses: Non-binary transfeminine. They/She pronouns. Sapphic. Hormone therapy since Dec 2020. Bottom surgery in 2022.

commands.name: !nonbinary
responses: Hi! I'm non-binary, which is a term that means a lot of different things to a lot of people. For me, it means that I identify more strongly with the general concept of being a human person than anything else. Despite presenting more femininely, I prefer to think of myself in a more neutral way, which is why I enjoy being addressed with both they/them & she/her pronouns, as it reinforces how I see myself! If you have any other questions about what it's like to be NB, please don't hesitate to ask!

commands.name: !rhetorical
responses: Do not tell me how to play the game. Do not spoil. Do not fake spoil. Do not hint, backseat, advise, guide, remind, or warn me in any way, please. Consider all questions to be rhetorical. If I am wrong about something, you don't have to be right. Revel in my ignorance, and enjoy my suffering.

commands.name: !frostfatales2023

commands.name: !frightfatales
responses: I'm participating in Frame Fatales' Halloween-themed event, Fright Fatales, this year! I'll be playing Luigi's Mansion Any% (No OoB) this Saturday at 1:15 CST. Going for a sub-hour run and maybe even a surprise PB!

commands.name: !TDoV
responses: March 31 is Transgender Day of Visibility! As a trans person who's also observable in the visible spectrum of electromagnetic radiation, I'm here playing games and being proud about myself in the most public way I can. Not every trans person has the same privilege to make themselves visible, though, so I think it's important to stand in solidarity with those who aren't yet able. We exist, we are strong, and our voices will be heard.

commands.name: !corathon
responses: At 12:00 CST on April 8, I'll be taking part in Corathon, an upcoming speedrunning marathon, by showcasing Luigi's Mansion 100%! This event will benefit Cora, a friend-of-a-friend who's trying to move out of Texas to a more trans-friendly part of the US, a reality I'm all too familiar with. There's a lot of amazing games and amazing people featured in this marathon, so be sure to mark your calendars! To see the full schedule, please visit https://horaro.org/corathon/schedule.

commands.name: !max%
responses: Max% is: All Toads, All Gold Frames, & All Money (142,390,000G in NTSC, 186,440,000G in PAL). It is arguably the hardest speedrun category in the game.

commands.name: !ladyarcaders

If you're a woman in gaming, whether it be casual, speedrunning, or development, please consider joining in! https://ladyarcaders.com/

commands.name: !binarybreakers
responses: The Binary Breakers are a community of speedrunners who are between, outside, and beyond the gender binary. If that sounds like a space you'd like to be a part of, please don't hesitate to reach out about joining! https://binarybreakersspeedrunning.carrd.co/

commands.name: !cutscenes
responses: "Why are you watching the cutscenes? I thought this was a speedrun! You've already seen them before!" - Because I wanna lol

commands.name: !dvt
responses: In 2022, I developed a substantial deep vein thrombosis (blood clot) in my left leg following a major surgery. Because I suffered significant vascular scarring from that clot, I'll forever be at high risk of developing another one, which means that I need to take low-dose blood thinners for the rest of my life to reduce the chances of that happening. Staying active also helps though, so I try to take regular breaks during streaming to walk around and stretch; I encourage you all to do the same!

commands.name: !autosplitter
responses: I use Toufool's Autosplitter https://github.com/Toufool/AutoSplit to control LiveSplit by comparing my video capture feed against a set of reference frames. Because I made my own imageset for F-Zero GX, they're unlikely to work for anyone else out-of-the-box due to the specific way I capture my game. DM me if you want help setting it up, yourself, though!

commands.name: git gud
responses: git: 'gud' is not a git command. See 'git --help'

commands.name: git --help
responses: usage: git [--help] <command> [<args>]     These are common Git commands used in various situations: add, google, pull, push, reset, status

commands.name: git add
responses: Your name has been added to the list. The FBI will be in contact with you shortly.

One of the four basic operations of arithmetic, adding was first invented on November 10, 1969 when the educational children's television series, Sesame Street, premiered on the American television station, PBS.
Adding has been deprecated. From now on, we recommend subtracting negative values instead
Nothing specified, nothing added.    hint: Maybe you wanted to say 'git add .'?

commands.name: git add .
responses: Your '.' has been received. We appreciate such generosity in these trying times.

commands.name: git google
responses: Step 1 of using git: google how to use git

commands.name: git pull
responses: The gravity of Earth, denoted by g, is the net acceleration imparted to objects due to the combined effect of gravitational pull (from mass distribution within Earth) and the centrifugal force (from the Earth's rotation). Near the surface, the pull of Earth's gravity is approximately 9.81 meters per second per second.

pull (ËˆpuÌ‡l) v. 1: To exert force upon so as to cause or tend to cause motion toward the force    2: To extract    3: To draw the support or attraction of    [Middle English, from Old English pullian]
